column3: na sɛ hom ammfa annto akoma mu
column4: dɛ hom dze enyimnyam bɛma me dzin a
column10: osiandɛ hom mmfa m’asɛm nnto hom akoma mu."

column3: mubotwuw hom asefo no enyim wɔ hom ntsi
column4: na matow egyanan apetse hom enyim
column5: mekyerɛ hom kum afɔr egyanan no; na wɔbɛsesaw hom aka ho akɔ."

column2: "Na hom bohu dɛ emi na masoma mbrasɛm yi abrɛ hom
"M’ahyɛmu a menye no dzii no yɛ nkwa na asomdwee; na medze maa no ama oeesuro
column4: na me dzin ho yɛɛ no hu."

column3: na woennhu ɔbrakyewsɛm biara wɔ n’anomu; ɔnye me nantseew asomdwee na tɔɔtsenyɛ mu
column4: na ɔdaan dodowara fii emumuyɛ ho."

column2: "Na otwar dɛ ɔsɔfo n’ano sie nyimdzee
column4: na ɔyɛ nhwɛdo pa ma afofor: osiandɛ ɔno nye dɔm EWURADZE no bɔfoe."

column2: "Naaso hom aman efi kwan no mu; hom ama dodowara efintsiw mbra no mu; hom asɛɛ Levi ahyɛmu no
"Dɛm ntsi na mo so mama hom ayɛ enyimguasefo na nkɔhweaban wɔ aman nyina enyim
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom nndzi m’akwan do
column4: na hom ahwɛ nyimpa enyim wɔ mbra no mu ara no."

column2: "Ana nnyɛ egya kor na hɛn nyina yɛwɔ? Ana nnyɛ Nyankopɔn kor na ɔbɔɔ hɛn nyina? Ɔyɛ dɛn na hɛn mu obiara twa no nua nkontompɔ
column3: yɛdze gu hɛn egyanom ahyɛmu ho fi yi?"
na wɔayɛ ekyiwadze wɔ Israel na Jerusalɛm; osiandɛ Juda ehura EWURADZE no krɔnkrɔnbea a ɔdɔ no no ho
column4: na ɔawar anana bosom ne babaa."

column2: "EWURADZE botwa ɔbanyin a onyim naaso ɔhyɛ da ara yɛ iyi no efi Jakob asese mu
column3: na ɔapow n’ayɛyɛdze a ɔdze brɛ dɔm EWURADZE no."

column2: "Na iyi so bio na hom yɛ: hom dze nyinsuwa kata EWURADZE n’afɔrmbukyia no do
column4: ma dɛm ntsi ommbu ayɛyɛdze no bi bio
column5: eso ɔmmfa ɔpɛ pa bi nngye no wɔ hom nsamu."

column3: Ase nye dɛn? Ase nye dɛ EWURADZE ayɛ ɔwo na wo mberantsɛber mu yer no ntamu dasefo

column2: "Ana Nyankopɔn annyɛ hom kor a no su wɔ hom mu? Ebɛnadze ntsi a? Dɛ hom bɔwo mba a wɔyɛ Nyamesurofo. Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ yie wɔ hom sunsum ho
column3: na mma obiara nntwa ne mberantsɛber mu yer nkontompɔ."

column6: na nyia ɔdze emimdzi kata n’atar do
column7: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse: dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ yie wɔ hom sunsum ho

column2: "Hom dze hom nsɛm ama EWURADZE aberɛ. Naaso hom bisa dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze mu na yɛama ɔaberɛ? Dɛ hom ka dɛ
column6: na hɔn ho yɛ no enyigye. Na hom bisa so dɛ
